channel.title: HectorZelaya.Dev on HectorZelaya.Dev
channel.description: Recent content in HectorZelaya.Dev on HectorZelaya.Dev

item.description:
About Me.

My name is Hector Zelaya. I am from El Salvador, a small (and beautiful) country from Central America. I am a computer software engineer.

Since 2015 I’ve been doing a little bit of everything: working with servers, programming, blogging and writing “techie” documentation. I love to learn new things every day and of course that I enjoy a good challenge.

In 2016 I learned about the DevOps philosophy and instantly fell in love with it.

Out of the office I like to play the guitar and the piano, I also sing and play video games. I am happily married with the most wonderful woman in the world.

I hope you enjoy my website.
